version_description:
Important fixes:
-We fixed the disconnection problem that was happening on older devices.
-Issues with watching consecutive ads have been resolved.
-Avatar creation screen issues have also been resolved.

New Stuff:

Discover new ways to move with our NEW two player gestures.

Bug Fixes:
If you've been having some issues lately, never fear, we've fixed them with our development magic.

New stuff:
We’ve put up some brand new leaderboards. Go and see them!
Our developers have made some tweaks to the app to improve its performance.

Bug fixes:
We’ve also made a bunch of bug fixes, because no one likes bugs.

New stuff:
We’ve installed a brand new shop in the Velvet Lounge. Go and see it!
You can now perform ‘Feisty' gestures on your higher-level friends.

We fixed a load of bugs. (You can thank us later).

We also added a bunch of new stickers, and fixed some old ones.

New stuff:
As well as updating some of the animations and sounds inside the Hotel, we’ve made several performance improvements and bug fixes. Enjoy!

New stuff:
Daily Hideaway tasks! Complete these to earn goodies.
We totally redid the UI. It’s pretty.
Oh, also… bug fixes and performance improvements: check!

New stuff
We’ve implemented a tutorial to help new guests find their feet in the Hotel.
New sounds have been added - we hope they’re music to your ears!
We’ve also made it easier to access the FAQ section.
Also: a ton of bug fixes!

New stuff:
Hotel Hideaway now has a brand new augmented reality feature: the Augmentarium! Visit it to take your Hideaway avatar to any real-world location. There is also a handy little camera feature - send us your photos on Facebook and Instagram!
We changed the private message list so that unread messages are displayed higher up. Now there’s no excuse to leave your friends hanging.

Our team has also (as per usual) made a load of technical improvements to the app. We really look after you, don’t we?

New stuff:
-Our brand new public room is now open: Sunset Street!
-We added Hideaway Camera functionality everywhere - now you can use it anywhere in the Hotel. Time to get snap happy.
-You can now also record video using the Hideaway Camera. Fabulous.
-We’ve made it so that you can choose your skin colour on the avatar creation screen.
-We’ve added sound controls to the title screen.
-You’re now able to skip one task module every day. Ditch the ones you don’t like!

-Assorted bug fixes and optimisations have also been implemented.

New things:
Our new My Room customisation feature has arrived!
High level guests can now achieve new prestige levels.
We’ve implemented a 28 day reward cycle.
Avatars now get a much better selection of clothing on creation.

Our developers have also tweaked the app and eradicated ANOTHER legion of bugs.

New stuff:
We’ve added several special new wall items to your room’s furniture inventory!
Visit your room and tap on the customisation gizmo on the wall to use them.
Also implemented: a variety of bug fixes and performance improvements.

New stuff:
Different sized room layouts are now available! Tap the ‘Layout’ button while editing your room to see what’s available.
You can now open ten Tailor of Fortune rewards at once. Mega.
You’ll now get a special, exclusive item on the 28th day consecutive day you log in.
We’ve added seasonal Lootbox items. (These items are exclusive to the Lootbox Machine).
The iPhone X screen is now supported!

Assorted bug fixes have also been made. We had fun getting rid of that horrible lot, believe us.

New stuff in Hotel Hideaway:

-A big new robot we’ve called the Carpenter of Chance now resides inside the Oasis Lobby. Visit him daily to collect crates containing new My Room items!
-We've added colours to loot boxes.
-The Colour Shop now has a tab for My Room items. Time to go technicolour crazy in your rooms.

We’ve also made a few minor tweaks to how things work inside the app, removed a bunch of pesky bugs and implemented some handy fixes.

Thank you for playing Hotel Hideaway, dear guests!

New Stuff:

• We’ve added Spanish and Turkish language options to the app. ¡Genial!
• A new shop selling My Room items has opened in the Oasis Lobby. And get this: it’s got Xmas stuff for sale!
• Also included in this MAMMOTH update are room slots (save multiple rooms) and a My Room item recycler. Time to get decorating, we think.

We have also made a variety of fixes and improvements to things including loot boxes and the seasonal rewards system. Happy Christmas!

• A new shop selling My Room items has opened in the Oasis Lobby. And get this: it’s got Xmas stuff for sale!
• Also included in this MAMMOTH update are room slots (save multiple rooms) and a My Room item recycler. Time to get decorating, we think.

We have also made a variety of fixes and improvements to things including loot boxes and the seasonal rewards system. Happy Christmas!

New stuff:
- Great news! We’ve added the ability for you to save multiple outfits in your avatar editor.
- It’s a good day for guests with lots of duplicates. Fast recycling is now a thing! You can now recycle up to 40 items at a time.

As well as making some small improvements to the app, our developers have fixed the My Room item bug. Items are now moved back to your inventory after you re-save a room where they are missing.
Bug fixes and other app optimisations.

New stuff:
* New feature: you can now publish your room to make it accessible to all other guests in the Hotel! 
* We added support for the Huawei App Store. 
Bug fixes and other app optimisations.
Bug fixes and other app optimisations.

- Room scoring is now live. Compete with the rest of the Hotel to get your room to the top of the Room Ladder!

Our developers have also made a variety of tweaks and performance improvements to keep your stay in the Hotel tip-top.

Our developers made a couple of changes to the way room scoring works:
- Cookies are no longer reset when a room is republished.
- The 'New Rooms' tab is now the default tab and is visible when guests open the 'Published Rooms' window.

Thank you your feedback - we hope you like the changes!

New stuff:

You now have the ability to block guests completely. You can also ban them and kick them from your rooms.
The Recycler now gives out face slot items!
The top 100 winners from the previous My Room season are now displayed in the 'Top Room Prizes' section of the app.

A multitude of bugs have also been fixed. Happy days.

We've given you all inboxes! You'll get most of your news, notifications, and rewards from these helpful little bits of kit from now on.
During cookie wars and other competitive events, each team's progress will now be visible in a new community challenge meter, located on the beach.
Now, when you get coins and diamonds, you'll see a nice little animation showing it all being moved to your currency store (also known as your wallet.)

New stuff:
We added a selection of new cosmetic effects and additions for high level guests. Shiny times lie ahead.
Bug fixes:
- Facebook login errors are now explained more clearly.
- We fixed an issue with the in-game camera. …Must. Take. More. Photos.
- We’ve also made an array of improvements and changes that should improve the performance and stability of loot boxes, room seasons, inboxes, and the distribution of rewards. Because, after all, stability is key.

So yeah, now everyone can dress up competitively. For prizes. 2020 is looking up.

Three words: Trials. Of. Style. Our new mini game IS HERE!
So yeah, now everyone can dress up competitively. For prizes. 2020 is looking up.
Bug fixes and other app optimisations.
Bug fixes and other app optimisations.
Bug fixes and other app optimisations.
Bug fixes and other app optimisations.

New stuff:

The loot box machine is now called Lost and Found. (And loot boxes are now suitcases.)

- We added the ability to open ten suitcases at a time!
- VIP membership was added as an optional extra.
- It's now much clearer which mini event is running in the UI.

A variety of bugs have also been fixed. Fun times.

Bug fixes and improvements.

- Some Trials of Style photoshoots now have specific requirements to participate.
- Profile cards are EVEN MORE customisable – different backgrounds are now available!
- You can now select and manipulate multiple My Room items at the same time.
- You're now able to see the outfit you submitted in a Trials of Style photoshoot.
- You can also see the top scoring outfits after a photoshoot ends.
- As well as some earlier fixes to suitcases, now, if there is an issue when opening one you'll be shown a pop up message.
- We added a search function to both your avatar editor and My Room inventory.
- We added a daily task for submitting an outfit in a photoshoot and voting in one.
- You can now buy face items, clothes and skin/hair colours while in the Trials of Style screen.
- Added button to reset outfit to default on Trials of Style screen.
- Lvl 50+ guests now have different coloured speech bubbles.
- You can now drag and rotate My Room items at the same time.

This update contains the absolutely spectacular new Concert Venue public room. Keep an eye on the news section for information about our first performer!
In addition, our team fixed a variety of other issues relating to performance and crashing.

New stuff:
- We added 16 brand new FREE default makeup colours!
- Going forward, outfits that finish in the top 10 in a global Trials of Style photoshoot will have a reward sent to their inbox.
Bug fixes:
Fixed issues with level up rewards, news articles, event changes (such as recycling prices), and other things not appearing until log in and then out again.

Bug fixes and other app optimisations.
Bug fixes and other app optimisations.
Bug fixes and other app optimisations.
Bug fixes and other app optimisations.

- Seasons were added to the Trials of Style! Check our recent news article for more information.
- Scoring in Trials of Style photoshoots is now more precise. (You'd get 3.52 instead of just 3.5, for example.)
- Trials of Style also now has a clever new matchmaking system. You’re now more likely to be matched in photoshoots with guests who are nearer your level and have the same gender avatar as you.
- You can now see how many other guests are watching a Concert Venue performance at the same time as you are!
- We improved the performance/decreased lag when browsing the Hotel’s shops.
- The performance of the looks editor has also been improved.

We added a brand new feature: GROUPS!
We added VIP-only photoshoots to the Trials of Style!
You can also now participate in the same photoshoot multiple times.
Stickers now show on your profile card correctly again.
Other performance improvements and bug fixes.
